Extract Information from a Receipt:

If the receipt is absolutely unreadable do mark it as unreadable. We will inform the user that he needs to take a better picture.
  • Total Amount paid (including tax and tip) and Number of Individuals (when applicable)
  • Name of the Venue
  • Currency and Location
  • Date and Time (when possible)
  • Last four digits of Credit Card Information (when applicable)
  • Classify receipt into a category

Look at the receipt below and extract the information described above.  Click on the image to see the full size image (in new window)

Total Amount: (tax and tip included)

Total People: (if more than one)

Currency:

Location: (format: city, country)

Year:

Month:

Day:

Hour: (eg: 16)

Venue Name: (when applicable)

Credit Card: (when applicable)

Unreadable:

Unreadable
